Package gate.creole.ml

Interface Summary
AdvancedMLEngine This interface is used for wrappers to Machine Learning engines.
MLEngine This interface is used for wrappers to Machine Learning engines.
 

Class Summary
Attribute Describes an attribute associated to a ML instance.
DatasetDefintion Stores data describing a dataset.
MachineLearningPR This processing resource is used to train a machine learning algorithm with data extracted from a corpus.
